code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:white f executive aged 57 years presents with severe thoughts of death frequently but denies suicidal thoughts, severe taking no pleasure in doing activities and has not appetite for food and feels worthless and guilty, severe increasing irritability, being snappy towards people, unable to hold a job, often tearful for no reason and Mental Health. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in her past she denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 170 cm, Weight 47.1 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, Urine toxicology cocaine (-), PCP (-),TCAs serum concenteration (+) a:Depression p:administered trazodone - 75 mg /day, performed Urine toxicology, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

content2.Unmatched: her past she denies ever using cigarettes

td.content: s:a 58 yr old female presents with moderate feelings of loneliness and isolation for more than 2 weeks. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in her past she does not smoke o:Height 170 cm, Weight 47.5 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Depression p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed buproprion SR - 300 mg /day, and ordered TSH.

content2.Unmatched: her past she does not smoke
